tasks.label: Django makemigrations
args: cd "d:\3 Year 1\Graph Theory\UniRoute\backend"; if (-not (Test-Path .venv)) { py -3 -m venv .venv }; .\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1; python -m pip install --upgrade pip; pip install -r requirements.txt; python manage.py makemigrations universities
